about_the_game:
Explore a Huge City Full of People and Traffic

 There are 5 sections to the city, each with their own designs and layouts. Find parks, rivers, interesting locations, and important locations such as the Pier, and the Airport while you explore this vast map. There is be plenty of people and traffic in each area for you to engage with at your own leisure.

Cause Chaos and Destruction Throughout The City Streets

 The city contains a huge amount of city props such as street lamps/lights, benches, fire hydrants, trees, and other traffic for you to ram into and destroy in order to fuel your rampage. Every section of the city is detailed with lots of different objects for you to crush under your vehicle. Try ramming into other traffic too, and use them as a new way to cause carnage.

Steal Fancy and Fast Cars and Enjoy a Fun Rampage

 Try out a huge collection of vehicles available to steal - I mean drive all spread throughout the city. You can find a wide range of vehicles from big, slow offroad vehicles with good performance on dunes, and sand, from fast supercars that can be driven through city streets at high speed.

Tune Into Plenty of Different Radio Stations While You Cruise Around In The City

 This game offers a decent selection of radio stations to listen to while your explore and cause carnage throughout the city streets. Each station also offers different songs and genres of music.

Engage With The Dialogue System and Talk Trash To The NPCs

 This intuitive dialogue system allows you to interact with people through 2 very different ways. one is being nice... But that's boring, so the other is through insulting them and provoking them. People will react differently to what you say depending on how their conversation is going with you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: AMD FX 6300 @ 3.8 GHz, Ryzen 3 - 1200, Intel Core i5 2400 @ 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit or Windows® 11 64 Bit
  • Processor: AMD FX-8350 @ 4.0 GHz, Ryzen 5 - 1400, Intel Core i7-3770 @ 3.5 GHz or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
